00006 GLTexture::GLTexture()
00007 {
00008     m_glTextureID = 0;
00009     glGenTextures(1, &m_glTextureID);
00010 
00011     textureDebugIdentifier = lastTextureNumber;

00016 */

00018 }

00028 void GLTexture::loadTextureData(InputDataFormat format, unsigned int width, unsigned int height, bool generateMipMaps, void* inputData)
00029 {
00030 
00031     if (width == 0 || height == 0)
00032     {
00033         char Buffer[512];
00034 
00035         sprintf(Buffer, "TextureID: %i loadTextureData called with a bad width or height\n", textureDebugIdentifier);
00036         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeData(Buffer);
00037 
00038         return;
00039     }
00040 
00041     //Test if the width is a power of two (Width BITWISEAND (Width - 1)) will only equal 0 when it is a power of two
00042     if ((width & (width - 1)) != 0)
00043     {
00044         char Buffer[512];
00045 
00046         sprintf(Buffer, "TextureID: %i loadTextureData width not a two power %i\n", textureDebugIdentifier, width);
00047         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeData(Buffer);
00048 
00049         return;
00050     }
00051 
00052     GLuint internalFormat = 0;
00053     GLuint dataFormat = 0;
00054 
00055     switch (format)
00056     {
00057         case input_data_byte_rgb:
00058         {
00059             internalFormat = GL_RGB;
00060             dataFormat = GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE;
00061 
00062             break;
00063         };
00064 
00065         case input_data_float_rgb:
00066         {
00067             internalFormat = GL_RGB;
00068             dataFormat = GL_FLOAT;
00069 
00070             break;
00071         };
00072 
00073         case input_data_byte_rgba:
00074         {
00075 
00076             internalFormat = GL_RGBA;
00077             dataFormat = GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE;
00078 
00079             break;
00080         };
00081 
00082         case input_data_float_rgba:
00083         {
00084             internalFormat = GL_RGBA;
00085             dataFormat = GL_FLOAT;
00086 
00087             break;
00088         };
00089 
00090         case input_data_byte_luminance:
00091         {
00092             internalFormat = GL_LUMINANCE;
00093             dataFormat = GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE;
00094 
00095             break;
00096         }
00097 
00098         case input_data_float_luminance:
00099         {
00100 
00101             internalFormat = GL_LUMINANCE;
00102             dataFormat = GL_FLOAT;
00103 
00104             break;
00105         };
00106 
00107         case input_data_byte_luminance_alpha:
00108         {
00109             internalFormat = GL_LUMINANCE_ALPHA;
00110             dataFormat = GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE;
00111 
00112             break;
00113         };
00114 
00115         case input_data_float_luminance_alpha:
00116         {
00117             internalFormat = GL_LUMINANCE_ALPHA;
00118             dataFormat = GL_FLOAT;
00119             break;
00120         };
00121 
00122         default:
00123         {
00124 
00125             printf("Unknown format");
00126             return;
00127 
00128         };
00129 
00130     }
00131 
00132     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, m_glTextureID);
00133 
00134     if (generateMipMaps == true)
00135         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP, GL_TRUE);
00136     else
00137         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP, GL_FALSE);
00138 
00139     glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, internalFormat, width, height, 0, internalFormat,  dataFormat, inputData);
00140 
00141     if (generateMipMaps == true)
00142     {
00143         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
00144         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
00145     }
00146     else
00147     {
00148 
00149         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00150         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00151 
00152     }
00153 
00154     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0);
00155 
00156     m_textureWidth = width;
00157     m_textureHeight = height;
00158 /*
00159     char Buffer[1024];
00160     sprintf(Buffer, "Texture %i copied image context data height %i width %i\n", textureDebugIdentifier, m_textureWidth, m_textureHeight);
00161     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeToLogFile(Buffer);
00162 */
00163 }
